name: Hustle Season8
summary: n eighth series has been confirmed, however creator Tony Jordan has said that this will be the last for at least a while and the last with the current cast.[1] Guest stars featuring this season will include Sheila Hancock, Martin Kemp and Paterson Joseph.[63] Peter Polycarpou and John Barrowman[64] have also revealed on Twitter that they will have guest roles in series eight.[citation needed] This will be the third series to be filmed in Birmingham, the fifth in HD and the fourth series featuring all of the current cast.[63] Adrian Lester is also set to direct an episode, in which Mickey is kidnapped.[63] Other cons will see the team take on the world of slimming pills and pull off a gold heist. The series has been confirmed to air on Friday 6th January on BBC1 at 9pm.
